channel.title: Homes on Jinkyu Koo
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jinkyu Koo

item.description: Contact Info Name: Jinkyu Koo (구진규 in Korean; 具珍奎 in Hanja) Address: 2788 San Tomas Expy, Santa Clara, CA 95051 Email: jinkyuk (at) nvidia (dot) com I am now a senior deep learning software engineer at NVIDIA. I got my Ph.D. from Purdue University, studying issues on embedded systems, network security, and smart grid privacy, and have worked in industry as a software engineer on Linux systems, the physical layer of wireless communication systems, and machine learning accelerators.

Jang, “Apparatus and method for performing ranging in a communication system,” Patent number: US8059525, Issue date: Nov 15, 2011 C.H. Suh, J. Koo, D.S. Park, Y.K. Cho, E.T. Lim, J.S. Woo, “System and method for acquiring cell in a frequency overlay communication system,” Patent number: US7852813, Issue date: Dec 14, 2010
